hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition on Regulatory Clarity Momentum Surge
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes with positive regulatory catalyst (MiCA implementation, clear jurisdictional guidance), a surge in both spot volume (>150% 30-day average) and positive funding rates (aggregate > 0.01%) will signal high-probability transition to BULL regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regulatory clarity removes a major uncertainty discount. When combined with volume confirmation and shifting derivatives positioning, it suggests institutional and sophisticated capital entering, creating sustainable momentum for regime change.
entry_conditions: Major positive regulatory development within past 3 trading days (news sentiment score > 0.7)
Spot volume across top 5 exchanges > 150% of 30-day average for 2 consecutive days
Aggregate perpetual funding rate turns positive (>0.01%) after being neutral/negative
BTC closes above its 50-day moving average

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BULL (confidence > 65%) OR 12% price appreciation
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price falls back below 50-day MA by > 2% and volume drops to < 80% of 30-day average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 40% of such regulatory+volume signals result in BULL regime transition within 15 days.
